name: test_e2e_with_logs[253_PATH_TRUNC_001]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_TRUNC_001` |
| **Name** | Null byte truncation |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | truncation |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `../../../etc/passwd%00.jpg`
